body: As mentioned in #9, libre animations require a libre skeleton. Cooperate with experienced animators to create a future proof reference humanoid. Add necessary animation features, learn about state of the art.

comments.body: Archangel in the JKCommunity Discord is interested in this topic, too. Mentioned [FACS](http://ascl.cis.fiu.edu/hapfacs-open-source-softwareapi-download.html) (Facial Action Coding System) and [PRAAT](https://www.fon.hum.uva.nl/praat/)
Eez [would work on lip-sync if somebody models a new Jan](https://jkhub.org/forums/topic/4020-i-present-a-challenge/?tab=comments#comment-58279).
